name: Sphere Dashers!
description:
Welcome to Sphere Dashers!

You are a sphere who is rolling happily, but one day, the fatal black obstacles are on the way! Your goal is to dodge the obstacles and try to beat your high score! Every 100 points will be harder! Over 500 points is the hardest!

This is a Endless runner game! You roll the sphere left and right while you dodge black obstacles! Roll as far as you can!

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right keys or button - Move

Escape - Pause/Resume Game.

Tools:

Unity

If you have suggestions or problems, ask me in the comments below!

Inspired from the "How To Make A Video Game" tutorial by Brackeys on YouTube
